Uses of Class
javafx.application.Application

  • Packages that use Application 
    Package Description
    javafx.application
    Provides the application life-cycle classes.

    • Uses of Application in javafx.application

      Subclasses of Application in javafx.application 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Preloader
      Class that is extended to define an optional preloader for a JavaFX Application.
      Methods in javafx.application that return Application 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Application Preloader.StateChangeNotification.getApplication()
      Returns the Application instance associated with this notification.
      Method parameters in javafx.application with type arguments of type Application 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Application.launch(Class<? extends Application> appClass, String... args)
      Launch a standalone application.
      Constructors in javafx.application with parameters of type Application 
      Constructor and Description
      StateChangeNotification(Preloader.StateChangeNotification.Type notificationType, Application application)
      Constructs an StateChangeNotification of the specified type for the specified application.
